name: CUBED
description:
CUBED is a trial and error game developed by Pallet Productions on a site called Flowlab.io. You play as a cube that's tasked with completing 20 increasingly difficult platforming challenges. As you play you may change your skin, click around for little secrets, and discover different techniques. 

CUBED includes...

  • 20 levels 
  • Over 10 skins
  • 2 Secret Scrapped Levels
  • A small time trial feature

Enjoy!
